short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all user comments on YouTube, so you can be more productive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide all user comments on YouTube. Nothing else.

There is no option to temporarily turn the YouTube comments back on in the extension - if you want to see the comments again (not recommended), you will have to uninstall or disable this extension.

(Extension icons attribution: Message icons created by Freepik - Flaticon https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/message - thanks.)
